bondingCurve.title: Bonding Curve
bondingCurve.description: PELON price follows a sigmoid curve that gradually increases as more tokens are sold. The price starts at a low initial price and gradually approaches a configured maximum price. This mechanism ensures early buyers get better prices while the price increases in a predictable and transparent manner.

priceFluctuation.title: Price Fluctuation
priceFluctuation.description: The price automatically increases with each purchase according to the sigmoid curve mathematical formula. There is no external price manipulation - each purchase increases the price deterministically and transparently. The current price is calculated in real-time based on the total amount of tokens sold.

noFees.title: No Buy/Sell Fees
noFees.description: The TokenSale contract does not charge additional fees. You pay exactly the price calculated by the bonding curve, with no hidden commissions or additional transaction fees. The only cost is the token price according to the current curve.

noOwnerFunctions.title: No Owner Functions Affecting Purchases
noOwnerFunctions.description: Although the contract has owner functions (such as pausing the sale or adjusting parameters), these do not affect the fundamental purchase/sale mechanism. The price is automatically calculated according to the bonding curve formula and cannot be manipulated by the owner. Purchases work in a decentralized and transparent manner.

noMint.title: No Mint Function
noMint.description: The PELON token has no mint function. All tokens were created at deployment time and are available in the TokenSale contract. No new tokens can be created, ensuring a fixed and predictable supply.
